title: Giving a 8s cd spellshield to the new banshees is an awful idea.
body:
You know what happened when you reworked malz and his passive was beyond overpowered (and still is) and had to get nerfed multiple times.

Why are you giving every ap champion this?

Its just beyond stupid and will just break the game, its going to be Edge of Night v2.0

Except they probably wanted to build better more powerful items, but were pigeonholed into that one broken spellshield item because anything else would be inefficient.

Even ADCs were buying it. ADCs, who generally follow the "late-game crit DPS" fantasy, were forced to buy this item or die. ADC mains were forced to pick champions who synergized with this item, or die.

That being said, a lot of those Kha/Rengar picks were probably fotm picks, and not actually people who mained those champs. **_They probably wanted to pick a different champion, but couldn't, because they had to pick a champion that synergized well with the broken item._** So even if they were one-shotting you from stealth, they may not have been having as much fun as you think they were... Because maybe they really wanted to play something else instead - but couldn't.

Mages cried loud enough for an AP version of Edge of Night.

Riot unfortunately listened.
I didn't see anyone ask for that, I just saw people saying Edge of Night shouldn't have existed with all the AD+MR options.
